text.title: Pennsburg
text.p:
Pennsburg
is a city in
Montgomery County
in
Pennsylvania

p.s: Pennsburg , Pennsylvania is a small town in Montgomery County that prides itself on being a family oriented , welcoming community .
It is part of the Upper Perkiomen School District .

list.item:
Unami Creek
.
The beautiful Unami Creek is home to a variety wildlife and spectacular scenery .
The area hosts white tailed deer , turkeys , woodpeckers , different varieties of hawks , and great blue herons , among others .

Schwenkfelder Library and Heritage Center
.
Here you can find the history of the Upper Perkiomen Valley region .

Perkiomen Prep School
.
A private boarding and day school .
Notable alumni include Al Dublin , John Cecil Holm , and Harold Schaffer .

Perkiomen Trail
.
A 19 mile long trail lining the Perkiomen Creek that offers horse trails , jogging , biking , or just sight-seeing .

Green Lane Park
.
Boasts fishing , boating , camping , tennis , and ice skating as well as a playground and plenty of picnicking space !

Pennsburg Nature Preserve
.
Peaceful and serene walking trails located right off of East 5th Street .

The Grand Theater
, 252
Main Street East , Greenville .
An affordable , family oriented movie theater that features a large stage , 12,000 watts sound system , and even a VIP section .
Once called the Old Valley Theater , it was renovated in 2004 and is now celebrating its 86th anniversary .

Macoby Run Golf Course
, 5275 McLean Station Rd , Green Lane .
The front 9 holes have a 138 ' of elevation change with both hills and trees to keep you on point .
The back 9 holes offer a bit of a reprieve with open terrain .

Sweet Water Golf Course
, 2554 Geryville Pike .
A " 2777 yard par 36 with even two par 5 ’s – one of them the 475-yard No. 4 .
Nine and 18 hole rates are available .
" Sweet Water Golf Course also " The Loft " venue for private parties and weddings .

Bear Creek Mountain Resort
, 101 Doe Mountain Ln , Macungie .
Located about 15 minutes away from Pennsburg is Bear Creek 's Ski Resort and Spa .
Spread over 330 acres , Bear Creek offers skiing , snowboarding and snow tubing , fishing , boating , tennis , hiking , and biking .
It also features banquet and meeting facilities , grille , and a hotel and spa with indoor and outdoor pools and hot tubs .

Scottish Irish Festival
.
This popular , three days Festival is held at Green Lane Park .
It features live entertainment , music , food , dancing , childrens ' activities , arts and crafts and everything Scottish-Irish Culture !

East Greenville Fire Company 's Annual Carnival
.
Cotton Candy , Funnel Cake , Ferris Wheels , and fun .
The Fire Company 's annual carnival is always popular is Pennsburg .

Community Day
.
Main Street is shut down and local vendors and residents line the streets selling items , food , and auctioning off anything from antiques to bridal gowns .

Quakertown Farmers Market
, 201 Station Rd , Quakertown .
Over 120 Indoor Flea Market Vendors with anything from unique gifts and antiques to fresh produce .
